errors.missedParameter: One or some of required parameters does not exist. Related parameters:
errors.connectionError: Connection failed! Please be sure that a valid address is specified. Related parameter:
errors.connectionClose: Connection closed! Please close the application and try again later..
errors.alreadyLoggedIn: The user is already in system right now !
errors.fieldsInvalid: One or more of necessary fields are invalid !
errors.logError: An error occured while logging the session statistics!

messages.selectReceiver: Select who will receive the message
messages.viewInfo: user(s) is(are) watching / listening you right now
messages.idAlreadyInUse: This ID is already in use! Please try again with another ID.
messages.shareTip: You did not share your camera and microphone yet!
messages.sharingLimitation: Only 4 users can share the devices at the same time!
messages.invitation: invited you Video Conference. Please click to join
messages.fileSizeLimitation: You can't send files bigger than 10 MB!
messages.fileRequestDelivered: Your request to send file is delivered, the download will start after accepted.
messages.fileNotice: wants to send a file to you
messages.fileRequestDeny: denied your request to send file!

words.unpublish: Stop to share my camera and microphone
words.windowActivating: Activate the window when receive new message
